commitResults.messageTitle: Rename project, add greet, exit Level 0 of ip
Add echo, modify gitignore Add echo functionality to chatbot, exclude .project from being pushed to remote
Add Task and TaskManager objects, refactor Fido Abstracted the recording of tasks to the TaskManager and Task objects. Refactored fido to have a main run function instead of having everything in main

Add Parser class, refactor Fido to use parser Abstracted away the responsibility of collecting user inputs and parsing them to the Parser class. This avoids having to redeclare Scanner over and over again and using the nextLine() method which may be hard to read in code

Added feature to mark tasks as done.  Added getTaskIndexForMarking method in parser.  Added handleTaskMarking and handleUnmarkingTask in Fido to not obfuscate  code in run.  Added methods to mark a specific task index as done/undone in  TaskManager.  Added methods to mark task as done/undone in Task
Clean code Added extra abstraction layers. Classes such as Formatter, UserInterface was added. This ensures more modular code so that changes will be more predictable and easier to trace through.
Fix bugs Added exceptions to be thrown and handled when the user input is empty ie) no spaces. Added new error messages to be printed to the user when commands are invalid
Refactor TaskManager Added isIndexOutofRange to conform with SLAP framework
Clean code Added constants for magic variables, fixed indentation, format of output messages
Refactor command types Added enumeration to map commands over to strings. This ensures that the classes are not overloaded with magic strings

Add Todo, Deadline, Event Added ability to add the above. The 3 classes above is derived from the Task class. Addititonal enumerators were made to account for the REGEX expressions that have to be extracted from the input strings. Added functionality to the parser to check for the correct events and deadline, although there may be cases of fallthrough
Clean syntax Cleaned up code syntax to ensure code readability
Rename enumerators Refactored enumerators to be in line with java coding standards (Although the enums are mainly used as constants)

Add incorrect input handling Modified parser to throw exceptions in the event of invalid todos, deadlines and events, together with empty inputs. Classification of invalid types: Todo: no additional argument supplied after the todo keyword Event: /to and /from were not specified or no arguments were given after the keywords Deadline: similar to event
commitResults.messageBody:
Added an Enumerator for Error messages to have a fixed unified file to
specify the various error messages

commitResults.messageTitle: Add additional exception checks Added checks for todo, event and deadline, to make sure that the commands did not include keywords from other commands
Merge branch 'branch-Level-5' Merging features of handling errors onto main branch
Add Index out of bounds error message Modified unmark and mark command in fido to follow the other action commands. Main eror handling will be done by the Fido.run method
Merge branch 'branch-Level-5'
Add delete functionality added delete for Level 6 and the corresponding error handling, similar to mark/unmarking tasks
Add appropriate error message for delete
Merge branch 'master' into branch-Level-6 resolved conflicts regarding marking/unmarking tasks and error messages
Merge branch 'branch-Level-6'
Add file saving feature Added ability to save tasklist to disk, where the file is saved onto a file named tasklist. upon startup, application will also read data from the file and load it into memory
Merge branch 'branch-Level-7' Merging working level-7 features into master branch
Refactor FileManager changed file paths and directory paths to be static variables, edited the filenames to distinguish it as a .txt file
Merge branch 'branch-Level-7'
Refactor FileManager
Merge branch 'branch-Level-7'
Refactor code shifted classes into their respective packages namely being utilities, exceptions, enumerators and datastructures. Corrected indentation errors
Merge branch 'branch-Level-7-refactoring'
Add more OOP, Refactor code Ensured indentation is consistent and added more OOP
Merge pull request #1 from yeozhishen/A-MoreOOP

Add find functionality Added parser function to parse the find commands. Added ListManager function to find based on keywords. Edited syntax errors regarding printing of Task class. Added correpnding errors for commands and error messages
Merge pull request #2 from yeozhishen/branch-Level-9
